analysis.key_quote: This rule would roll back the clock to pre-progressive era government of the spoils system which was characterized by child labor, tainted meat, and any other number of social ills that have been remedied over the course of the past century.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its potential to undermine civil service protections and promote politicization, drawing parallels to historical abuses associated with the spoils system.
